snippet.title: Pure Pure Pero Pero Princess - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After being laid off from his job, Toshio Kaname, finds himself at rock bottom. When a beautiful woman approaches him on the street asking him to help save her kingdom, he agrees out of sheer desperation. Who knew this decision would lead to an incredible, fantasy adventure!

Pure Pure Pero Pero Princess on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/pure-pure-pero-pero-princess/

Pure Pure Pero Pero Princess on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2862710/Pure_Pure_Pero_Pero_Princess/
